ygData.subject: Re: F.Y.I.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm I think you may have me confused with someone else my name is Rox not Roxoro. And why did you call my question stupid this does not seem very nice. Sorry
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm I think you may have me confused with someone else my name is Rox
not Roxoro. And why did you call my question stupid this does not
seem very nice. Sorry if my typing is bad english is my second
langage I'm from Malaysia so I only speak english on occasion. I also
play on the Stormhammer server. Again sorry for the mix up.

Rox



--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Nate <n-pettit1@t...>" <n-
pettit1@t...> wrote:
> To all of you that replied to Rox's somewhat stupid question...
> That was a bogus question. Roxdat Kradle is my bazaar mule. This
> guy I work with did that as a joke. I'm sorry for the confusion,
but
> I just wanted it out in the open should it happen again. I will
only
> post from this user name and email.
>
>
> Roxoro, 59 Monk.
> Innoruuk
